subject: Delegation of Powers relating to various issues under Commercial operation

AF National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) +-5 & 6, Hazr-10, ETaT, T frrf)-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 No. 11041/217/2007-Admn Dated:09.10.2014 Policy Matters: Administration/Finance (150/2014) (Decision taken vide Agenda Item 210.03 of EC in its meeting held on 24.09.2014) Sub:  Delegation of Powers  relating to various issues   under Commercial Operations With reference to Para -1 (vi) of   Policy Circular dated 13.12.2012 (Admn/Fin: 101/2012) , the Executive Committee decided the revised delegations to the effect that henceforth, the powers vest with CGM/RO for approving the relief to be given to the Contractor for closure of Toll Plaza or non-collection of user fee (toll) at the Toll Plaza of any duration, based on the facts and on account of the reasons not attributable to the Contractor. 2. This issues with the approval of Competent Authority: 70 (V.KSharma) Chief General Manager (LA & Coord ) To: All officers and employees of HQ/ROs/PIUs/CMUs/Site Offices NHA
